attributes.action: ban lorries during rush hour to reduce traffic congestion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lorries are slow and when overtaking each other, especially on hills, slow all traffic down. This causes cars and lorries behind to drive even slower ending in traffic jams. Also lorries coming onto slip roads make left lane drivers slow down to allow them to enter the motorway. Not only will this solve congestion it will also reduce accidents.

rejection.details:
The issues in this petition have been responded to for on this previous petition http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Lorries/
If you want to start a new petition anyway please re-submit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
